FuncDef: This command configures the egress SAP queue drop tails as a percentage reduction from the MBS of the queue. For example, if a queue has an MBS of 600 kbytes and this percentage is configured to be 30% for the low drop tail, then the low drop tail will be at 420 kbytes and out-of-profile packets will not be accepted into the queue if its depth is greater than this value and will be discarded.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the percentage reduction from the MBS for a queue drop tail. Values-0 to 100, default.

ExtraInfo: Default: Exceed drop tail: 	 20%Low drop tail: 10%High drop tail: 0%Highplus drop tail:   0%
